      • fieldMapperErrorHandler

        public JdbcMapperFactory fieldMapperErrorHandler(FieldMapperErrorHandler<JdbcColumnKey> fieldMapperErrorHandler)
        the FieldMapperErrorHandler is called when a error occurred when mapping a field from the source to the target. By default it just throw the Exception.
        Parameters:
        fieldMapperErrorHandler - the new FieldMapperErrorHandler
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • ignorePropertyNotFound

        public JdbcMapperFactory ignorePropertyNotFound()
        Change the mapperBuilderErrorHandler to an IgnoreMapperBuilderErrorHandler.
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • mapperBuilderErrorHandler

        public JdbcMapperFactory mapperBuilderErrorHandler(MapperBuilderErrorHandler mapperBuilderErrorHandler)
        Set the new MapperBuilderErrorHandler. the MapperBuilderErrorHandler is called when an error occurred or a property is not found in the builder while creating the mapper.
        Parameters:
        mapperBuilderErrorHandler - the MapperBuilderErrorHandler
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • rowHandlerErrorHandler

        public JdbcMapperFactory rowHandlerErrorHandler(RowHandlerErrorHandler rowHandlerErrorHandler)
        the RowHandlerErrorHandler is called when an exception is thrown by the RowHandler in the forEach call.
        Parameters:
        rowHandlerErrorHandler - the new RowHandlerErrorHandler
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • useAsm

        public JdbcMapperFactory useAsm(boolean useAsm)
        Parameters:
        useAsm - false if you want to disable asm generation of Mappers, Getter and Setter. This would be active by default if asm is present in a compatible version.
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • disableAsm

        public JdbcMapperFactory disableAsm(boolean disableAsm)
        Parameters:
        disableAsm - true if you want to disable asm for generation and to resolve constructor parameter names.
        Returns:
        the current factory

      • newMapper

        public <T> JdbcMapper<T> newMapper(Class<T> target,
                                   ResultSetMetaData metaData)
                            throws SQLException
        Will create a instance of JdbcMapper based on the specified metadata and the target class.
        Parameters:
        target - the target class of the mapper
        metaData - the metadata to create the mapper from
        Returns:
        a mapper that will map the data represented by the metadata to an instance of target

        SQLException
